text:
Sara-Kartik Wrap Up The Delhi Schedule Of Imtiaz Ali's Next With Loads Of Laughter And Cake!
Sara-Kartik Wrap Up The Delhi Schedule Of Imtiaz Ali's Next With Loads Of Laughter And Cake!
If you really want something, the entire universe conspires to make it happen for you. Well, this is what is said! And for Sara Ali Khan, this has come true in the most special way. In the last season of Koffee With Karan, where she appeared with her Dad Saif Ali Khan, Sara confessed that she has a crush on Kartik Aaryan and wouldn't mind dating him.
Twitter
Since then, there have been several questions back and fro for both Sara and Kartik and we as spectators enjoyed the show! While KJo and Ranveer Singh tried to play the cupid in a sweetest way, it's their professional stint that has finally brought them together.
Instagram
Both Sara Ali Khan and Kartik have been shooting for Imtiaz Ali’s next film, which is being touted as the sequel to his hit film Love Aaj Kal. While Love Aaj Kal originally starred Sara's father Saif Ali Khan, she will herself star in the sequel.
Just a few days ago, they shared the first look of Love Aaj Kal 2 and officially announced the film. She shared a picture captioning it as,
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
“Honoured, grateful and uncontrollably excited to be a part of Imtiaz Ali ‘s next! Starring @kartikaaryan & @randeephooda releasing on 14th Feb,2020. Presented by Jio Studios @imtiazaliofficial @reliance.entertainment @wearewsf @maddockfilms. Shoot in progress‼."
Sara and Kartik have wrapped up the Delhi schedule of the film and the pictures and videos that have bombarded the social media proves that the team had a blast!
Their wrap up party was all about goofy videos, cakes and laughter! The video will make you all the more excited for the film. Have a look:
While Sara made her Bollywood debut last year with Kedarnath and Simmba, Kartik will be juggling between Imtiaz' film and the official remake of Pati Patni Aur Woh, in which he will star opposite Bhumi Pednekar and Ananya Pandey.
title: Sara-Kartik Wrap Up The Delhi Schedule Of Imtiaz Ali's Next With Loads Of Laughter And Cake!
